review: I like it! So far its fairly fast and problem free.  If you want a decent way to watch Netflix and youtube on the cheap then do it!!  Make sure your HDMi port works before buying.  If it doesn't then your firestick is worthless.  Word.

review: The fire stick was very easy to install with the instructions given.  I am very pleased.

review: Great movies and TV shows available.  It was easy to set up once I got past my own security code.
